sub_title: Business Development, PSP Consultant, Problem Solver and Out of the Box Solutions Expert.
summary:
Specialties: Business Structure and Organization, Business Development (International), Entrepreneurship, Online Marketing, Sales & Communication, Team Management, Web development.

A passion and love for presentations and thinking outside of the box. Always complimented on my presentations and designs . Looking for exciting opportunities to develop myself.

Drop me a call at +31652716848 and reach out anytime. 

I am an ambitious International Account Manager with +3 years experience looking to broaden his horizons, skills and extend his knowledge to a new and interesting field while building upon my already acquired skills. I am currently looking for work in the field of Recruitment as I find it would compliment my natural skills in communication and sales.

I am always looking at ways to increase efficiency, for example when at Deutsche Bank, I was able to take a 4 day processes and revision it into 1 day with excel. Being a natural strategic thinker I have worked in business development as well as with business analysts and project managers on numerous occasions and have always been the go-to-guy when a brainstorm was needed to overcome any obstacle. 
Originally from Florida, growing up in the Netherlands and studying and working in the EU, I have a very international background and enjoy and converse easily with both locals and international individuals alike.



Languages:

English:				Mother tongue 
Dutch:					Semi-Fluent
French:					Good
German:				        Good

profile_positions.description:
MultiSafepay has developed Europe's most personalized payment ecosystem, for small to medium-sized businesses and marketplaces. MultiSafepay's end-to-end toolkit has enabled more than 18,000 businesses across Europe to focus on innovation, and simplify their business processes.

• Generate and follow up on leads from different channels: online, sales funnel, outbound, inbound
• Through hard sell, identified clients missing conversion opportunities.
• Assisted clients with products, added-value services and regional specific payment methods. 
• F2F meetings with Partner Accounts, to grow the relationship, figure out key needs and overcome any obstacles to ensure we were their preferred supplier.
• F2F with large enterprise clients to custom build out of the box solutions.
profile_positions.title: Business Development Manager

profile_positions.description:
Eden.io Project
• Assisted US start-up to break into the Benelux market from scratch by identifying, contacting and on-boarding 100 new partners and clients.
• Presented Eden's SAAS by giving demos and coaching clients on how to use the software first hand.
• Led contract negotiations with partners and prepared all necessary amendments to the MSA for final legal team approval. 

Summitcom Project
• Identified and contacted key demographic for client to set up on-boarding presentation for marketing team.
• Analyzed clients inbound site traffic to identify additional revenue streams and gaps in market.
profile_positions.title: Director

profile_positions.description:
Fusion Worldwide's mission is to solve supply chain shocks with strategic sourcing solutions. Fusions goal is to be a premier global open-market distributor by keeping our customers’ vision first. 

As a BDM my role was to:
-Drive revenue through prospecting new customers, managing existing customer relationships and growing business within strategic accounts. 
-Interact with prospects via telephone, email, chat and on-site visits. 
-Collaborate with customers and our marketing team to identify and develop additional areas of opportunity and added value services such as VMI, Hubbing, LTB, Kitting and Excess Management. 
-Educate customers on the current state of the electronic components market to maximize efficiency and support their supply chain. 
-Work daily advising and assisting our Account Executives with their major clients and aid in built strategies on how best to penetrate and retain customers for the long term. 

Key accomplishments:
• Overachieved new business targets by +140% by opening 10 new major accounts within 7 months by excelling in finding and contacting key decision makers.
• Opened a major account first month with previously unattainable client by using German language skills to identify key needs and overcome previous inhibitions.
• Trained and led the new account executives in our products, market research, added value services, the detail-oriented RFP process and email marketing to ensure long-term client retention.
• Arranged and led 30+ presentations a month, reported key insights to upper management, and build client retention strategy.
• Strategically closed a major deal after only a single initial meeting, leading to account executive reaching their annual goal of $1M profit in the first week of 2022.
profile_positions.title: Business Development Manager

profile_positions.description:
• Working B2B for the International Wholesale Sales Department and Account Management
• Using previous connections, expanded this Dutch national ISP's network internationally into Germany, France, Luxembourg and the United Kingdom. 
• Having met a major potential clients at a tech fair, I used persistence to eventually get an opportunity on a large RFP which we won securing 300 locations with a total of $3M profit.
• Business Development by expanding and on-boarding other clients in Belgium, Germany and France.

• Using excellent communication and organisation skills to engage with high level buyers.
• Identifying and on-boarding new clients and business opportunities.
• Acting as the first point of contact for company clients and meeting them in person to ensure good understanding of their needs while maintaining a strong business relationship.
profile_positions.title: International Partner Manager
